en-AU.title: Browse - A Whole New World!
en-AU.description: See the internet in a whole new light with great new browse features. Download the beta version to try the new features
en-AU.bg: linear-gradient(white 2px, transparent 2px), linear-gradient(90deg, white 2px, transparent 2px), linear-gradient(rgba(255,255,255,.3) 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255,255,255,.3) 1px, transparent 1px)
